Parameter.description: Optionally filter by year and period, period must be set to work.
Optionally filter by period, where 1: First semester, 2: Second semester and 3: TAV. year must be set too

examples.title: Request-Example:
Success-Response:
Example usage:
examples.content: curl -i http://uc-courses.lopezjuri.com/api/v1/courses/MAT1630/equivalences?year=2016&period=1

examples.title: Error-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
{
  name: "notFound",
  message: "The requested resource couldn't be found",
  statusCode: 404,
  errorCode: 404
}

examples.title: Example usage:
examples.content:
curl -i http://uc-courses.lopezjuri.com/api/v1/courses?q=IIC # simple search
curl -i http://uc-courses.lopezjuri.com/api/v1/courses?name=Programación&initials=IIC&section=1 # strict search
